title: Leading primetime TV programming genres viewed in the U.S. 2015
summary: This bar chart has 15 columns on the x axis representing Genre, and Share of respondents in each Genre on the y axis.
Genre Sitcoms or comedy has the highest Share of respondents and Soap operas has the lowest Share of respondents.
Genre Sitcoms or comedy has 12.0 times more Share of respondents than Genre Soap operas which is has the lowest.
